string-array.name: victory_quotes
string-array.item: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake. \n- Napoleon Bonaparte
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee. \n- Muhammad Ali
Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories. \n- Sun Tzu
Whether in an advantageous position or a disadvantageous one, the opposite state should be always present to your mind. \n- Sun Tzu
Winning isn\â€™t everything, but it beats anything that comes in second. \n- Paul Bryant
My whole life is about winning. I don\'t lose often. I almost never lose. \n- Donald Trump
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. \n-Winston S. Churchill
If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut \n-Albert Einstein
We\'re talking about practice! We\'re talking about practice! We ain\'t here talking about the game! We\'re talking about practice, man! \n- Allen Iverson
